description: This file defines a React functional component 'NoteEditor' that provides a user interface for editing a single note, including title and content, with validation, save, and delete functionalities.

methods.name: NoteEditor({ note, onSave, onDelete, saving, keyHint, })
methods.description: React component for editing a note with title and content, handling save and delete actions, and displaying validation errors.

methods.name: handleSave
methods.description: Handles the save action; validates input and invokes the onSave callback with updated note data.
